name: Armor
description: The amount of damage you reduce all incoming sources of kinetic, energy, or explosive damage by. For mechs, armor cannot go higher than 4

name: Electronic Defense
description: The number that most electronic warfare attacks must beat to be successful

name: Evasion
description: The number that most melee and ranged attacks must beat in order to hit with an attack

name: Grit
description: 1/2 your level. Added to melee and ranged attacks, system points, and hp

name: Heat Capacity
description: The amount of heat your mech can take before any more heat will cause it to make an overheating check.

name: Hit Points (HP)
description: The amount of damage you can take as a pilot before going down and out, and the amount of damage a mech can take before it takes 1 point of structure damage.

name: Range
description: The range of your ranged attack, measured from yourself. Depends on weapon

name: Repair Cap
description: The maximum number of repairs to your mech you can make per mission

name: Resistance
description: Resistance to damage or a type of damage means it is reduced by half, rounded up, after armor is applied. You can only have resistance to damage once (it doesn’t stack multiple times)

name: Structure
description: When a character with structure goes to 0 HP, it makes a structure check, then takes 1 structure damage. When a target runs out of structure, it either goes into the CRITICAL state (player mechs) or is destroyed outright.

name: Stress
description: When a character that can take stress overheats, it takes 1 stress then makes an overheating check.

name: Tech Attack
description: Electronic Warfare attacks, modified by your systems

name: Threat
description: The range of your melee and overwatch attacks with certain weapons, measured from yourself. Base threat for all weapons is 1, but it may be greater depending on the weapon.

name: Sensor Range
description: The range in which you can make electronic warfare attacks, lock on, and use some systems. If a character is in your sensor range, you know about its existence unless it is hidden.

name: Size
description: The area that a character controls, rounded up for determining space. For example, a size 2 mech is an area 2 spaces on each side approximately 2 spaces high. Does not necessarily represent exact physical size.

name: Speed
description: How far your mech moves when it moves (in spaces)
